title: Collaborative e-portfolio-based science inquiry project in distributed learning environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific experimental methods and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Distributed collaborative learning environments using smartphone-based VR simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically collect evidence of the scientific inquiry process using Web 2.0 tools in distributed learning environments.
Learners can integrate collaborative problem-solving processes into e-portfolios through peer assessment and feedback systems.
Learners can produce e-portfolios that visually represent scientific thinking processes in alignment with Learning Design standards.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
